sect2.title: HPCC JAPIs Source Code
sect2.para: The source can be found under the HPCC Platform github account in the HPCC-JAPIs repo.

To utilize the API(s) you can either import the pertinent JAPI project into your workspace and access the API source directly, or you can build the library and subsequently import into the client project.

Contributions to source are accepted and encouraged. All contributions must follow the JAVA source format described in the HPCC-JAVA-Formatter.xml file which can be found in HPCC-JAPIs/eclipse. This formatter can be used by the Eclipse IDE to automatically format JAVA source code.

listitem.para: Import the HPCC-JAVA-Formatter.xml file and set it as the Active profile.
From the JAVA editor, choose Source->Format
